meanings.definition: A pentapeptide neurotransmitter that acts as a pain suppressor in the body.
meanings.sent1: Enkephalin helps reduce pain signals in the body.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study enkephalin to understand how it eases pain.
meanings.sent3: The enkephalin molecule decided to take a break from stopping pain.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like an enkephalin injection, soothing everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The image of enkephalin as a tiny superhero fighting pain stuck in his mind.

meanings.definition: Any of a group of endorphins occurring naturally in the brain.
meanings.sent1: Enkephalin is one of the brain's natural pain relievers.
meanings.sent2: Scientists have discovered various types of enkephalin in the brain.
meanings.sent3: The enkephalin gang in his brain always knew how to throw a party.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was like a surge of enkephalin, spreading warmth to all.
meanings.sent5: The concept of enkephalin as a brain's own pharmacy amazed him.
